item.description:
LADIES AND GENTLEMEN!!!! THE FOURTH ZOMBIE WALK WILL RISE IN THE STREETS OF SALEM, MASSACHUSETTS ONCE AGAIN. THIS TIME, ROLLING OUT EVEN BIGGER AND BETTER THAN EVER DONE BEFORE! AT THIS POINT, WE ASK YOU TO SAVE THIS DATE, MARK YOUR CALENDARS, AND AWAIT MORE INFORMATION TO BE REVEALED!! INVITE EVERYONE, AND LIKE ALWAYS.. SPREAD THE WORD LIKE RIB CAGES MY FRIENDS!!!

 

The zombie walks are always a great time. You'll be able to build out your portfolio and mingle with other members of the group. We'll also plan to all do dinner together or something fun.

 

Just wanted to get this date out for everyone to mark.
item.how_to_find_us: Call us when you arrive. 1-800-210-9531. We'll be the guys with the cameras. We will have a more accurate location as soon as the event page on FB announces more info.
item.name: ZOMBIE WALK SALEM 2011
